name: Jet Fire - Run Run Amazing
description:
Battle your way through wave after wave of gun slinging enemies while simultaneously avoiding obstacles!
Fly your jetpack-wielding, gun-toting hero through hordes of enemies determined to shoot you out of the sky. There are two buttons on your screen. One will activate your hero’s handy-dandy jetpack and boost him through the air. The more you tap it, the higher your champion will fly. The other button activates your hero’s blaster. It will release a deadly shot that will annihilate any enemy unfortunate enough to be caught in its path. Collect as many coins as you can as you fight your way to the end!

Game Features:
- Multiple heroes to choose from
- Beautiful landscapes to battle through
- Endless enemies and fun

Channel your inner hero with a jetpack and blast your way through the waves of invaders! Download Jet Fire free for mobile device!
